message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for it, but I'd like to try to get a better deal.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Can you do any better than that?
I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still $5 away from my target price. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $102.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still $1.50 away from my target price. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $101.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still $1 away from my target price. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. This is my final offer.
